info.name: Teach on Mars Web Services
info.description:
This is the documentation for the Teach on Mars Web Services. If you want to try those routes for yourself, you should start by setting up your environment variables:
* Download the [Teach on Mars environment blueprint](https://github.com/TeachonMars/WebservicesAPI/raw/master/doc/TOMEnvironmentBlueprint.postman_environment.json)
* Update the environment variables with the information that the Teach on Mars team gave you.

Then you can click on **Run in Postman** and try out the services.

More information in our [Help Center](https://support.teachonmars.com/hc/en-us/articles/360039561412).

item.name: Learners Management

query.description: Limit the number of learners in the paginated response (default value: 10)
Select the page that is returned by the service. (default value: 1)
Search one or multiple learners using their logins
Search for learners matching the search query string. Match is tested against firstname, lastname, login and email

request.description: Returns a paginated list of learners according to the given parameters.

response.name: Fetch learner

query.description: Search one or multiple learners using their logins
Search for learners matching the search query string. Match is tested against firstname, lastname, login and email
Limit the number of learners in the paginated response (default value: 10)
Select the page that is returned by the service. (default value: 1)

header.value: Access-Control-Allow-Origin, Accept, origin, content-type, X-TOM-NONCE, X-TOM-RTS, X-TOM-APP, X-TOM-API-HASH, X-TOM-API-KEY, X-TOM-DEVICE-LANGUAGE, X-TOM-APPLICATION-LANGUAGE, X-TOM-LEARNER-ID, X-TOM-AUTH-TOKEN, X-TOM-DEVICE-PLATFORM

item.description: This is a set of routes to deal with the learners (users who access the application).
